Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/mobile/quick-capture" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""text"": ""Test task"", ""user_id"": ""mobile-user"", ""voice_input"": false, ""auto_mode"": true, ""ask_for_clarity"": false}")

Bash(.venv/bin/python -c "
import sys
import asyncio
from src.api.tasks import mobile_quick_capture, QuickCaptureRequest, get_task_service

async def test():
    request = QuickCaptureRequest(
        text=''Test task'',
        user_id=''mobile-user'',
        voice_input=False,
        auto_mode=True,
        ask_for_clarity=False
    )
    task_service = get_task_service()
    try:
        result = await mobile_quick_capture(request, task_service)
        print(''Success:'', result)
    except Exception as e:
        print(''Error:'', e)
        import traceback
        traceback.print_exc()

asyncio.run(test())
")
